meanings.definition: A smaller or subordinate development within a larger development.
meanings.sent1: The new playground is a subdevelopment within the larger park.
meanings.sent2: The subdevelopment of the shopping mall includes a small food court.
meanings.sent3: The tiny subdevelopment of the ant farm amused the children for hours.
meanings.sent4: Her subdevelopment of the story added layers of complexity to the plot.
meanings.sent5: The subdevelopment of the garden created a cozy nook for reading.

meanings.definition: The act or process of developing something further or in more detail.
meanings.sent1: The subdevelopment of the plan involved adding more details to the design.
meanings.sent2: After the initial brainstorming, the team focused on subdevelopment of the project.
meanings.sent3: The subdevelopment of the recipe led to a delicious new dish.
meanings.sent4: His subdevelopment of the theory shed light on a previously unknown aspect.
meanings.sent5: Through subdevelopment, the painting revealed intricate hidden patterns.
